Emmanuel Kojo Dadson (1953 - 9 Febụwarị 2021) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye egwu. A maara ya nke ọma maka igosi na iduzi ihe nkiri na usoro dịka Home Sweet Home, Sun City na Run Baby Run
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama maka ọchị ya na ụdị ihe nkiri ọchị ya. Ọ dara ọrịa mkpọnwụ ahụ mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri n'afọ 2012. Ọ nwụrụ na 9 Febụwarị 2021, ọ dị afọ iri isii na asatọ.
Kojo Dadson bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka Love Brewed In An African Pot, Run Baby Run, Home Sweet Home, Sun City, Hotel St
James, Doctor Love, Location Africa, n'etiti ndị ọzọ.
N'afọ 2012, ọ dara ọrịa mkpọnwụ ahụ mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọrịa mkpọnwụ ahụ ahụ metụtara okwu ya ma mee ka ọ nọrọ n'oche nkwagharị. Ọ ghọkwara onye egwu n'oge ọ na-enweghị ike ịgagharị nke ukwuu.

A kwanyeere Dadson ùgwù na Ghana Actors and Entertainers Awards (GAEA) na ihe nrite Legendary ya na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri isii gụnyere Grace Omaboe ma nye ya akara, ntụaka na ego a na-akọwaghị maka ọrụ ha na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na ntụrụndụ na Ghana.

Dadson nwụrụ na 9 Febụwarị afọ 2021 na Korle-Bu Teaching Hospital mgbe ọ na-anata ọgwụgwọ dialysis maka nsogbu akụrụ, izu abụọ nwunye ya nwụsịrị. Ọnwụ ya kpatara nkwanye ugwu na ozi sitere na mgbasa ozi Ghana, mgbasa ozi West Africa na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ibe ya.
